name: CQ.Ext.grid.CellSelectionModel
doc:
This class provides the basic implementation for single cell selection in a grid.
The object stor...

props.name: grid
props.doc: The GridPanel for which this SelectionModel is handling selection. Read-only.

methods.name: clearSelections
methods.doc: If anything is selected, clears all selections and fires the selectionchange event.

methods.name: enableBubble
methods.doc:
Enables events fired by this Observable to bubble up an owner hierarchy by calling
this.getBubble...

methods.name: getSelectedCell
methods.doc:
Returns an array containing the row and column indexes of the currently selected cell
(e.g., [0, ...

methods.name: hasSelection
methods.doc: Returns true if there is a selection.

methods.name: isLocked
methods.doc: Returns true if the selections are locked.

methods.name: relayEvents
methods.doc: Relays selected events from the specified Observable as if the events were fired by this.

methods.name: select
methods.doc:
Selects a cell.  Before selecting a cell, fires the
beforecellselect event.  If this check is sat...

events.name: beforecellselect
events.doc: Fires before a cell is selected, return false to cancel the selection.

events.name: cellselect
events.doc: Fires when a cell is selected.

events.name: selectionchange
events.doc: Fires when the active selection changes.
